answer_found_by_llm: The script uses both apt-get and yum package managers to install openssl, curl, and wget. For log deletion, it uses the command "rm -rf /var/log/yum*" to remove yum logs.
The encryption-related functions found in the script are: encrypt_grep_files(), encrypt_home(), encrypt_root(), encrypt_db(), encrypt_ssh(), and docker_stop_and_encrypt()
